title: Breaking the internet: Reactions to Rahul Dravidâ€™s â€˜angryâ€™ avatar in viral advertisement
content:
On the day of the Indian Premier Leagueâ€™s curtain-raiser for the 14th season, an advertisement featuring former India captain Rahul Dravid, to borrow a phrase that fits the occasion, broke the internet.Dravidâ€™s appearance in an advertisement for CRED went viral within hours of Virat Kohliâ€™s tweet about it. The legendary batsman, proclaiming himself to be â€œIndira Nagar ka Gundaâ€, goes about letting out steam when stuck in a traffic jam.
